700947f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Waterbury Avenue
700947f-a.text:
3215 and 3217 East Tremont Ave., east side, between Waterbury and
Mayflower Aves., showing the monumental work of C. Di Tullio at No. 3215.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
